root.description: OverviewJagged Alliance: Crossfire is a stand-alone expansion to the tactical RPG â€“ Jagged Alliance: Back in Action. Crossfire adds new mercenaries, new environments and new weapons. In this game it is all about planning your actions. Choose from a variety of mercenaries to form your team. The key to success is the mix of these mercenaries.The story behind Crossfire is classic: Help to get rid of an evil group of mercenaries holding an entire country hostile. Nobody in the world will help, so the official government turns to your organisation for help. The game offers about 15 hours of additional gameplay.PC System RequirementsOS:Windows XP (SP2), Vista oder Windows 7Processor:i5 Processor (2,4 GHz or better) or similar AMDMemory:4 GB RAMGraphics:Shader 3.0 compatible graphics card (Ati 5850 and Geforce 460 or better) with 768 MB RAMHard Drive:3 GB HD space
